trans-unit.source: Facilities are agreements between a lender and a borrower, which control the general conditions for a series of drawings against a credit line. The lender can give drawing authorization to several people (= borrowers), who are entitled to draw varying amounts at any time up to the total approved credit line. The utilization of this credit option for a facility is called a drawing. The lender calculates charges for the borrower (commitment interest). The charges that incur are calculated according to different methods.

seg-source.mrk: Facilities are agreements between a lender and a borrower, which control the general conditions for a series of drawings against a credit line.
The lender can give drawing authorization to several people (= borrowers), who are entitled to draw varying amounts at any time up to the total approved credit line.
The utilization of this credit option for a facility is called a drawing.
The lender calculates charges for the borrower (commitment interest).
The charges that incur are calculated according to different methods.

target.mrk: 授信协议是借款方和贷款方之间达成的协议，用于控制根据某一信贷额度进行多次提款的常规条件。
借款方可向多人（= 贷款方）授予提款权限，获得权限的贷款方有权在任何时间提取任意金额（不超过批准的总额度）的款项。
利用授信协议的此类信贷期权称为提取。
借款方将计算贷款方的费用（承诺利息）。
将根据不同的方法计算发生的费用。

trans-unit.source: The lender guarantees the availability of a limited credit amount at any time. The borrower has to pay a charge for this.

seg-source.mrk: The lender guarantees the availability of a limited credit amount at any time.
The borrower has to pay a charge for this.

target.mrk: 借款方保证在任何时候都可以提供有限的信贷额度。
贷款方必须为此支付费用。

trans-unit.source: The lender does not guarantee a credit limit. No charges are made for this.

seg-source.mrk: The lender does not guarantee a credit limit.
No charges are made for this.

target.mrk: 借款方不会保证信贷限额。
贷款方也无需支付费用。

trans-unit.source: The functions for managing facilities include functions for creating and processing them. You can assign deposits at notice, cash flow transactions and interest rate instruments to a facility. You specify which money market transactions can be assigned as drawings on the<uicontrol> Rules</uicontrol> tab page. For an overview of the transactions that have already been assigned to the facility, see the <uicontrol>Profiles</uicontrol> tab page.

seg-source.mrk: The functions for managing facilities include functions for creating and processing them.
You can assign deposits at notice, cash flow transactions and interest rate instruments to a facility.
You specify which money market transactions can be assigned as drawings on the<uicontrol> Rules</uicontrol> tab page.
For an overview of the transactions that have already been assigned to the facility, see the <uicontrol>Profiles</uicontrol> tab page.

target.mrk: 管理授信协议的功能包括创建和处理授信协议在内的功能。
您可以向授信协议分配通知存款、现金流交易和利率工具。
您可以在<uicontrol>规则</uicontrol>标签页上指定可作为提款进行分配的货币市场交易。
有关已分配给工具的交易的概览，请参阅<uicontrol>参数文件</uicontrol>标签页。
